text: Oldenlandia adscensionis was a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It was endemic to Ascension Island. It became extinct due to habitat loss. ==References== * Gray, A. 2003. Oldenlandia adscensionis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Oldenlandia adscensionis
